description:
3-in-1 protection for healthier plants

Eliminate insects, mites, and fungal diseases with Monterey® Garden Horticultural Oil—the all-in-one solution for your indoor and outdoor plants.

This OMRI-listed horticultural oil works on contact to control pests, mites, and fungal spores. It effectively controls eggs, larvae, and adults on contact and can help prevent diseases. Safe for use on fruits, vegetables, ornamentals, and more, it leaves no toxic residue and you can confidently apply it directly to edible plants—even on harvest day.

Sunday partners with trusted, effective solutions that support your garden’s health and harvest.

sections.product_features:
Insecticide, miticide, and fungicide in one spray
Kills eggs, larvae, and adult insects on contact
Targets aphids, mites, mealybugs, thrips, gnats, and common fungal diseases
OMRI-listed for organic gardening
Safe for use on edible plants up to harvest day
Ideal for fruits, vegetables, ornamentals, trees, and shrubs
Leaves no toxic residue on plants
sections.ingredients: Mineral Oil: OMRI-listed mineral oil suffocates exposed insects, mites, and fungal spores, providing broad-spectrum pest and disease control.
